Evaluate this sentence: Company A pays Company B $10 million for a revolutionary AI software within 12 months . If Company B fails to deliver a fully functional product by the deadline , they must refund 50 % of the payment and provide an additional 3 months of development free . However , if the delay is due to circumstances beyond Company B ’ s reasonable control , these penalties shall not apply . This agreement is governed by California law and any disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration . The parties are expected to agree on an appropriate solution that they have agreed to follow.

3. If two businesses in a business environment have a failure of the same quality, they may decide to terminate each one. If each business decides to choose their own outcome, the final contract must specify whether the end point must be decided by either business or by a third party. To do this, the final agreement must identify the two parties. If both businesses agree that the trade-off that must be taken would be better for both companies, the third party need only specify which is what. An example of this might be if the two parties cannot agree on the end goal of the contract, this arrangement would mean they signed a contract that was never agreed upon.
